rules.description: Cmd+Home to Cmd+Up: Move to document start
Shift+Cmd+Home to Shift+Cmd+Up: Select to document start
Cmd+End to Cmd+Down: Move to document end
Shift+Cmd+End to Shift+Cmd+Down: Select to document end
Home to Cmd+Left: Move to line start
Shift+Home to Shift+Cmd+Left: Select to line start
End to Cmd+Right: Move to line end
Shift+End to Shift+Cmd+Right: Select to line end
Shift+Cmd+Backspace to Cmd+Delete: Delete to line start
Shift+Cmd+Delete to Ctrl+k: Delete to line end
Cmd+Left to Opt+Left: Move to word start
Shift+Cmd+Left to Shift+Opt+Left: Select to word start
Cmd+Right to Opt+Right: Move to word end
Shift+Cmd+Right to Shift+Opt+Right: Select to word end
Cmd+Bksp to Opt+Bksp: Delete to word start
Cmd+Del to Opt+Fn+Bksp: Delete to word end
